description: Created to store medicinal mixtures, this container is composed of a gourd, wood, and glass beads. This type of vessel would be owned by a ritual healer and activated by prayer and music to enhance communication between the spiritual and physical worlds and assist a patient’s transformation from a state of conflict or misfortune to one of well-being. The figurative stopper here represents a spirit being that temporarily inhabits the container.
artist_info:
Probably Hehe
Tanzania
Eastern and Southern Africa
title: Medicine Container
